Hi, I'm trying to use Neural ODE with DiFEqFlux. My equation is :
```function true_ode(du,u,p,t)
    true_A, true_B = p
    if t < tc
        du[1] =true_A*0.041 - true_B*u[1]
    else
         du[1] = - true_B*u[1]
    end
end```
And I want to put her in the neural network :
```dudt = FastChain((u,p) -> true_ode(u),
        FastDense(1, 50, tanh),
        FastDense(50, 1))```
Do you think it's possible in spite the "if" temporal condition ?
